title: Quake1 TC Commander Keen 3D
content:
Thats right its a commander keen mod (Total Conversion) for quake.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]
I want to get this made somehow but ive never made a quake mod before and I wanted to make it like the idea Tom Hall had.
Tom Hall cant make keen 7-9 but I can make a mod.
Keen deathmatch can also be done but no killing because its keen maybe keen verses mort deathmatches too.
keen would be able to carry more than one weapon.
Vorticons in 3D!!
Dopefish is in quake but its just a picture on a wall but with a mod the dopefish could be a new enemy.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]
I would make new traps and dangers.
Keens pogo can be in the game too as a power up or selected
by pressing a number where a quake weapon would be.
Mortimer sould be in it as a final boss like quake 1 has a final boss-defeat mort win game.
keen should die after being hit once but how do you give keen lives in quake.
I would keep the switches and keys.
3D moving platforms, new keen power ups, huge 3D levels.
More ideas can be thought of....

COMMANDER KEEN 3D![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img]

[hr]
KEEN

[center] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] [/center]
DOPE

title: hmm
content:
Sounds really cool... But one, I don't have Doom. (Silly, lazy me.)

But, show us some work when you get some done, and let's check it out!

title: Commander keen 3D last level ideas
content:
I think mortimer should be the final boss in this mod and I want to make it like the last level of keen 3, only bigger and 3D.
mortimer now has a bigger badder giant robot and shoots at you. (remember since its keen you can only be hit once)
The only way to defeat mortimers giant robot is to shoot target switches on it and after the giant robot is destroyed mortimer appears from the wreakage ready to fight you.
Now its a one on one battle with mortimer in *3D* like in quake 2 when you fight the final boss, its like fighting two bosses and after the first one is defeated the second one appears from it but im not sure it can be done with quake 1, I can try though.
Keen finaly defeats mort by using the neural destroyer (new weapon) and walks to the universe destroying machine, presses all the buttons to open the fuse and you break it by either shooting it or jumping on it with the pogo.
If you ever seen the last level in quake mission pack 2, (I think) the end demo movie thing shows the player after destroying the machine jumps into the portal and it plays the conglatulations text.
I want to do something like that only after keen destroys the machine he escapes to the bean-with-bacon megarocket and flys away to the end text. (cool ending)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

[hr]
KEEN

[center] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] [/center]
DOPE

title: Re: garg
content: Well I think he is going for a more older style, like as if Tom Hall made the Keen games when he wanted to.

title: Re: garg
content:
Well, good luck, at least this'd transform a crappy game into something playable. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: garg
content:
From the admittedly very little I've seen of the Quake engine, I'd have to say I think the Unreal engine is probably a lot easier to mod for as well.
(Also there's a personal bias, I didn't like Quake, did like UT a lot, and after I tried some level editing in UT I discovered the Quake editing I saw other people do looked harder than necesary, but again in all honesty, I've seen little of it.)Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: More to tell you.
content:
There are only four game engines I would use for this mod.

-Quake (very old)
-Quake 2 (just the thing I think Tom Hall would have used at the time)
-Doom 3
-Unreal tournament (dont have)

Im going to go buy unreal tournament so by the time I begin making this keen mod this post may be called unreal tournament TC Commander Keen 3D.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Some tools for quake dont work well for windows XP and other tools I found kind of work.

Modifying quake to do funny things is more fun than playing it but it might be too old so now I am looking at quake 2 to see what it can do.

Ive made more plans for Commander keen 3D.

The power ups.

-invincibility (keen should have the shield from keen 3)
-invisibility (invisible keen)
-strength modifier (if keen had berserk mode from doom 3)

The weapons.

Every weapon would shoot a different color.

-Pogo stick (a classic, jump higher)
-neural disrupter (unlimited ammo)
-Confusion ray gun (make the enemy attack each other)
-Vorticon Rail-Gun
-neural destroyer (put em down for good)

Enemies I think should be in it.

Different number of shots stop them or a different weapon needed to stop them and some just get stunned.

-Yorp
-Garg
-Meep
-Tank Robot
-Dopefish
-Robo Red
-Arachnut

New enemies

-Vorticon mercenary (they fight like vortininjas)
-commander keen clone

I also want to bring key cards back from keen 1-3 and the key gems.

[hr]
KEEN

[center] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] [/center]
DOPE

title: Re: More to tell you.
content: If you were going to make a 3D Keen game, I think it would look best if you did it with an engine that uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cel-shaded_animation]cel-shaded graphics[/url], to give the game a distinct cartoon look like the Goodbye Galaxy series.  Proper 3D would look too "realistic" for the Keeniverse.

title: Cel-Shaded Graphics.
content:
A 3D Keen game with cel-shaded graphics would be cool.

I guess that a newer game engine is needed for that, what PC game that has cel-shaded graphics could I use or what if I make cel-shaded 3D models and maps.

I think quake 2 in openGL maybe could do it.

Also if I had a 3D model maker that could do that I would edit the models of other games, cel-shaded doom 3 monsters would look more like the older game.

title: Keeps on going!!
content:
I haven't given up yet on making a keen 3D game and I'm still learning how to Mod quake.

Tutorials.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

No real work has begun yet but doing this stuff to quake makes it a fun game again.

More keen 3D games![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pogo.gif[/img]

content:

title: Re: Keeps on going!!
content:
Someone should try Duke Nukum 3D as a conversion. I already have a graphics pack that puts Commander Keen tiles in place of the usual scenery.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Keeps on going!!
content: I think it would be tricky to pull off a Keen game using an engine like Duke or Quake - the graphics are too realistic, compared to the cartoony Keen feel.  I think doing a Keen game with the Jazz Jackrabbit 2 engine could work out quite well, and it would allow you to keep the game in the platformer genre, while at the same time giving it a slightly more 3D feel.

title: Re: Keeps on going!!
content:
Hah, yeah -- when I played Jazz 2 I thought Keen would look pretty good in it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] It'd be interesting to see, if someone has good graphics skills.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

Welcome to the $1,000,000 Make Something Unreal Contest, the ultimate modification competition brought to you by Nvidia in association with Epic Games and Atari Inc.

Educational Awards can run on UT2003 or UT2004, however Phase 3, Phase 4 and Grand Finals require your mod run on UT2004. For further details be sure to check out the Categories Listing, Legal, and Overview pages. When you are ready to submit for Grand Finals simply submit your mod!"

title: That thing you said.
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]This should be a community thing. Let it be done faster.[hr][/quote]

A group of people can make something better than just one person I think.

Whatever I can put my ideas for this mod to would be good.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

Making a 3D model for quake...I am not good at.

The player model from quake side view looks weird.

I was just going to make a model and put keens face on it from the title screen of keen 4.

.....

Im now looking at doom 3 and what can be done with it.

I like doom 3 more from what I've read so far.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img]

title: Re: That thing you said.
content:
When I was a kid, I had downloaded an editor for the wire-frame 3D models in Quake.

Of course, I was only like 11 years old, so I didn't get anywhere with it, but I'm sure I could do it now.

Likewise, there were a lot of people who would mod the game with the Quake C or C++ language or whatever, which I didn't know at all, but I am sure I can do it now.


In fact, I have recently thought of downloading shareware quake or digging up my old CD and screwing around with mods just to see what I could do.


If you want help with this, I don't know how much time I could commit to it but I'd be happy to try.

title: Re: That thing you said.
content:
Considering how slow the simple 2D Commander Keen Community Mod is going, I shouldn't think community participation has much to commend it.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: If quake was doom 3...
content:
The keen model for quake.

I started with a sphere and turn it into a helmet but it would never look right.

I didn't know how to use it though...

I also don't know that much about C++ and I've been reading stuff from here about quake modding.

[url=http://www.angelfire.com/ult/td/tuts.html]Quake modding[/url]

And

[url=http://wiki.quakesrc.org/index.php/HomePage]Quake wiki[/url]

So I haven't started anything yet.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

I'm going to start with the model, change the health to 1 and put it in 3rd person view.

Doom 3 or quake...I like them both.

Doom 3 would look better and cartoonish.

Quake and doom3 can do animated movies.

Story...

Need story.

Keen listens to transmissions from deep space.

He later finds out about a plan to create an army from captive aliens at a research station.

Wondering who's behind it he gets there only to find its a trap.

[img]http://img489.imageshack.us/img489/9199/srekeen1fh7.jpg[/img]
The research station not final...

Kind of like the idea tom hall had for the intergalactic zoo thingy and a reason for yorps in 3D.

The ideas for the levels start at the top with the forests then lower down with robots and mort.

[img]http://img239.imageshack.us/img239/7485/mrkeen1xr6.jpg[/img]
It can be better.

Morts giant robot.

Shoot the joints and the center to lower his shield.

Then shoot mort.
